Otiluke's Resilient Sphere Tips & Notes

Otiluke's Resilient Sphere is a CC spell that saves against Dexterity, and with spells such as Banishment (CHA Save) and Polymorph (WIS Save) you have multiple avenues to exploit a weakness in saving throws in particularly tough enemies. Is a very good option to protect Isobel at a certain point in the game. Notes & Tips go here

Lvl 4 Spells Banishment ♦ Blight ♦ Confusion ♦ Conjure Minor Elemental ♦ Conjure Woodland Beings ♦ Death Ward
